trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_SEQ_00<tab>U'odh Nunh is attempting to ignore you.

TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to U'odh Nunh at Forgotten Springs.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_SEQ_02<tab>You now possess the blood of seven ferocious sundrakes. Return to Forgotten Springs and present the blood to U'odh Nunh.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_SEQ_03<tab>Although U'odh Nunh now recognizes you as a passable hunter, he still refuses to tell you of the ingredient. This may take a while...

TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to U'odh Nunh at Forgotten Springs.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to U'odh Nunh at Forgotten Springs.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_000<tab>Perrrsistent bugger. Very well, let's have a look at you.

TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_001<tab>...You've seen your share of battle, there's no mistaking that. And you did manage to obtain that adamantoise egg. However, that was naught more than a display of brrrute force and blind courage.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_002<tab>The nunh I once fought also believed that his strrrength would save him. He was wrong, and now I am nunh.

TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_003<tab>Many years ago, I joined the Company of Heroes to hone my skills, instead of challenging my predecessor before I was ready. Even when I was young, I understood that victorrry goes to the patient, the cunning, the pragmatic.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_004<tab>That is why I claimed my position, and it is why I still hold it. And it is why I will not help an unprrroven whelp.

TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_005<tab>The Children of the Sands do not offer aid to strangers. To do so is a sign of weakness. However, if you were rrrecognized as a skilled hunter in your own right, it would be permissible to assist you.

TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_006<tab>A child who wishes to become a hunterrr must collect the blood of seven sundrakes. You are not a child, so you may find this to be easy. But you are not of the U tribe, so perhaps not.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_007<tab>I will consider your rrrequest once you have brought me the blood, and not a moment sooner.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_030<tab>I will not help an unproven whelp. Brrring me the blood, or we have nothing to discuss.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_035<tab>You are a hunterrr of beasts. This much I now know to be true.
TEXT_GAIUSB101_00820_UODHNUN_000_036<tab>But Titan is no mere beast. If you mean to hunt a god, you must prove much more to me.
